trans-unit.source: Getting started with .NET Core on Windows/Linux/macOS using the command line (SDK Preview 3)
trans-unit.target: 使用命令行在 Windows/Linux/macOS 上实现 .NET Core 入门（SDK 预览版 3）

trans-unit.source: Getting started with .NET Core on Windows, Linux, or macOS using the .NET Core command line interface (CLI)
trans-unit.target: 使用命令行接口 (CLI) 在 Windows、Linux 或 macOS 上入门 .NET Core

trans-unit.source: .NET, .NET Core
trans-unit.target: .NET, .NET Core

trans-unit.source: Getting started with .NET Core on Windows/Linux/macOS using the command line (SDK Preview 3)
trans-unit.target: 使用命令行在 Windows/Linux/macOS 上实现 .NET Core 入门（SDK 预览版 3）

trans-unit.source: This guide will show you how to use the .NET Core CLI tooling to build cross-platform console apps.
trans-unit.target: 本指南介绍如何使用 .NET Core CLI 工具生成跨平台控制台应用。

trans-unit.source: It will start with the most basic console app and eventually span multiple projects, including testing.
trans-unit.target: 将从最基本的控制台应用开始介绍，最终涵盖包括测试在内的多个项目。

trans-unit.source: You'll add these features step-by-step, building on what you've already seen and built.
trans-unit.target: 基于已经了解和生成的应用，逐步添加这些功能。

trans-unit.source: If you're unfamiliar with the .NET Core CLI toolset, read [the .NET Core SDK overview](../tools/dotnet.md).
trans-unit.target: 如果熟悉 .NET Core CLI 工具集，请阅读 [.NET Core SDK 概述](../tools/dotnet.md)。

trans-unit.source: Prerequisites
trans-unit.target: 先决条件

trans-unit.source: Before you begin, ensure you have [.NET Core CLI tooling Preview 3 or later](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/master/release-notes/preview3-download.md).
trans-unit.target: 开始之前，请确保拥有 [.NET Core CLI 工具预览版 3 或更高版本](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/master/release-notes/preview3-download.md)。

trans-unit.source: You'll also need a text editor.
trans-unit.target: 还需要一个文本编辑器。

trans-unit.source: Hello, Console App!
trans-unit.target: Hello，控制台应用！

trans-unit.source: First, navigate to or create a new folder with a name you like.
trans-unit.target: 首先，导航到一个文件夹或使用喜欢的名称新建一个文件夹。

trans-unit.source: "Hello" is the name chosen for the sample code, which can be found [here](https://github.com/dotnet/docs/tree/master/samples/core/console-apps/HelloMsBuild).
trans-unit.target: “Hello”是为示例代码选择的名称，可在[此处](https://github.com/dotnet/docs/tree/master/samples/core/console-apps/HelloMsBuild)找到它。

trans-unit.source: Open up a command prompt and type the following:
trans-unit.target: 打开命令提示符，键入下列命令：

trans-unit.source: Let's do a quick walkthrough:
trans-unit.target: 让我们进行快速演练：

trans-unit.source: [`dotnet new`](../tools/dotnet-new.md) creates an up-to-date `Hello.csproj` project file with the dependencies necessary to build a console app.
trans-unit.target: [`dotnet new`](../tools/dotnet-new.md) 会创建一个最新的 `Hello.csproj` 项目文件，其中包含生成控制台应用所必需的依赖项。

trans-unit.source: It also creates a `Program.cs`, a basic file containing the entry point for the application.
trans-unit.target: 它还将创建 `Program.cs`，这是包含应用程序的入口点的基本文件。

trans-unit.source: `Hello.csproj`:
trans-unit.target: `Hello.csproj`：

trans-unit.source: The project file specifies everything that's needed to restore dependencies and build the program.
trans-unit.target: 项目文件指定还原依赖项和生成程序所需的一切。

trans-unit.source: The `Import` tag brings in some properties that are common to all .NET Core projects.
trans-unit.target: `Import` 标记引入了一些对所有 .NET Core 项目都通用的属性。

trans-unit.source: The `OutputType` tag specifies that we're building an executable, in other words a console application.
trans-unit.target: `OutputType` 标记指定我们要生成的可执行文件，即控制台应用程序。

trans-unit.source: The `TargetFramework` tag specifies what .NET runtime we're targeting.
trans-unit.target: `TargetFramework` 标记指定我们面向的 .NET 运行时。

trans-unit.source: In an advance scenario, you can specify multiple target frameworks and build to all those in a single operation.
trans-unit.target: 在高级方案中，可以指定多个目标框架，并在单个操作中生成所有目标框架。

trans-unit.source: In this tutorial, we'll stick to building only for .NET Core 1.0.
trans-unit.target: 在本教程中，我们将仅针对 .NET Core 1.0 进行生成。

trans-unit.source: The `Compile` tag tells the compiler to build all the files in the current directory and all its subdirectories that have the `.cs` file extension, in other words all the C# files in the project.
trans-unit.target: `Compile` 标记告诉编译器生成当前目录及所有具有 `.cs` 文件扩展名的子目录（即项目中的所有 C# 文件）中的所有文件。

trans-unit.source: In advanced scenarios, it is possible to exclude files, but in this tutorial, and in most simple scenarios, this line can be left unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 在高级方案中可以排除文件，但在本教程中，且在大多数简单方案中，此行可以保持不变。

trans-unit.source: The `EmbeddedResource` tag instructs the build system to embed localization files with the extension `.resx` into the compiled executable.
trans-unit.target: `EmbeddedResource` 标记指示生成系统将扩展名 `.resx` 的本地化文件嵌入到编译的可执行文件。

trans-unit.source: We won't use that feature in this tutorial.
trans-unit.target: 在本教程中，我们不会使用该功能。

trans-unit.source: The `PackageReference` tags specify what dependency packages must be restored and included when building the application.
trans-unit.target: `PackageReference` 标记指定在生成应用程序时必须还原和包括哪些依赖项包。

trans-unit.source: Each package reference specifies the name of the package under the `Include` attribute, and a version number.
trans-unit.target: 每个包引用指定 `Include` 属性下包的名称和版本号。

trans-unit.source: In most advanced scenarios, you'll add more package references.
trans-unit.target: 在最高级方案下，你将添加多个包引用。

trans-unit.source: It is also possible to reference other projects on disk.
trans-unit.target: 也可以引用磁盘上的其他项目。

trans-unit.source: `Program.cs`:
trans-unit.target: `Program.cs`：

trans-unit.source: The program starts by `using System`, which means "bring everything in the `System` namespace into scope for this file".
trans-unit.target: 该程序从 `using System` 开始，这意味着“将 `System` 命名空间中的所有内容都纳入此文件的作用域”。

trans-unit.source: The `System` namespace includes basic constructs such as `string`, or numeric types.
trans-unit.target: `System` 命名空间包括基本结构，如 `string` 或数值类型。

trans-unit.source: We then define a namespace called "ConsoleApplication".
trans-unit.target: 然后我们定义一个名为“ConsoleApplication”的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: You can change this to anything you want.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将其更改为任何你喜欢的名称。

trans-unit.source: A class named "Program" is defined within that namespace, with a `Main` method that takes an array of strings as its argument.
trans-unit.target: 在该命名空间中定义了一个名为“Program”的类，其中 `Main` 方法将字符串数组作为其参数。

trans-unit.source: This array will contain the list of arguments passed in when the compiled program will be called.
trans-unit.target: 此数组将包含在调用编译的程序时所传递的参数列表。

trans-unit.source: As it is, this array is not used: all the program is doing is to write "Hello World!"
trans-unit.target: 按照这样，不使用此数组：程序所进行的全部操作就是编写“Hello World!”

trans-unit.source: to the console.
trans-unit.target: “Hello World!”。

trans-unit.source: We can make things a little more interesting by changing the `Console.WriteLine` into the following code.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过将 `Console.WriteLine` 更改为以下代码来使事情更有趣。

trans-unit.source: [`dotnet restore`](../tools/dotnet-restore.md) calls into [NuGet](http://nuget.org) (.NET's package manager) to restore the tree of dependencies.
trans-unit.target: [`dotnet restore`](../tools/dotnet-restore.md) 调用到 [NuGet](http://nuget.org)（.NET 的包管理器）以还原依赖项树。

trans-unit.source: NuGet analyzes the `Hello.csproj` file, downloads the dependencies stated in the file (or grabs them from a cache on your machine), and writes the `obj/project.assets.json` file.
trans-unit.target: NuGet 分析 `Hello.csproj` 文件、下载文件中所述的依赖项（或从计算机缓存中获取）并编写 `obj/project.assets.json` 文件。

trans-unit.source: The `project.assets.json` file is necessary to be able to compile and run.
trans-unit.target: 需要 `project.assets.json` 文件才可进行编译和运行。

trans-unit.source: The `project.assets.json` file is a persisted and complete set of the graph of NuGet dependencies and other information describing an app.
trans-unit.target: `project.assets.json` 文件是 NuGet 依赖项和其他描述应用的信息的持久化完整图片集。

trans-unit.source: This file is read by other tools, such as `dotnet build` and `dotnet run`, enabling them to process the source code with a correct set of NuGet dependencies and binding resolutions.
trans-unit.target: 此文件由其他工具（如 `dotnet build` 和 `dotnet run`）读取，让它们可以使用正确的 NuGet 依赖项和绑定解决方法集处理源代码。

trans-unit.source: [`dotnet run`](../tools/dotnet-run.md) calls `dotnet build` to ensure that the build targets have been built, and then calls `dotnet <assembly.dll>` to run the target application.
trans-unit.target: [`dotnet run`](../tools/dotnet-run.md) 调用 `dotnet build` 来确保已生成要生成的目标，然后调用 `dotnet <assembly.dll>` 运行目标应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can also execute [`dotnet build`](../tools/dotnet-build.md) to compile the code without running the build console applications.
trans-unit.target: 或者，还可以执行 [`dotnet build`](../tools/dotnet-build.md) 来编译代码，无需运行已生成的控制台应用程序。

trans-unit.source: This results in a `bin/Debug/netcoreapp1.0/Hello.dll` compiled application that can be run with `dotnet bin\Debug\netcoreapp1.0\Hello.dll` on Windows, and `dotnet bin/Debug/netcoreapp1.0/Hello.dll` on other systems.
trans-unit.target: 这使得 `bin/Debug/netcoreapp1.0/Hello.dll` 编译的应用程序可以在 Windows 上使用 `dotnet bin\Debug\netcoreapp1.0\Hello.dll` 运行，在其他系统上使用 `dotnet bin/Debug/netcoreapp1.0/Hello.dll` 运行。

trans-unit.source: You may specify an additional parameter on the command-line (assuming you are on Windows):
trans-unit.target: 可以在命令行上指定一个附加参数（假设在 Windows 上）：

trans-unit.source: As an advanced scenario, it's possible to build the application as a self-contained set of platform-specific files that can be deployed and run to a machine that doesn't necessarily have .NET Core installed.
trans-unit.target: 在高级方案中，可以将应用程序作为独立的特定于平台的文件集生成，该应用程序可以在未安装 .NET Core 的计算机上部署或运行。

trans-unit.source: See [.NET Core Application Deployment](../deploying/index.md) for details.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅 [.NET Core 应用程序部署](../deploying/index.md)了解详细信息。

trans-unit.source: Augmenting the program
trans-unit.target: 扩充程序

trans-unit.source: Let's change the file just a little bit.
trans-unit.target: 让我们对此文件进行些微更改。

trans-unit.source: Fibonacci numbers are fun, so let's try that out:
trans-unit.target: 斐波那契数字很有意思，我们来尝试一下：

trans-unit.source: `Program.cs`:
trans-unit.target: `Program.cs`：

trans-unit.source: And running the program (assuming you're on Windows, and have changed the project directory name to Fibonacci):
trans-unit.target: 运行程序（假设在 Windows 上并已将项目目录名称更改为 Fibonacci）：

trans-unit.source: And that's it!
trans-unit.target: 就是这么简单！

trans-unit.source: You can augment `Program.cs` any way you like.
trans-unit.target: 可以按任意喜欢的方式扩充 `Program.cs`。

trans-unit.source: Adding some new files
trans-unit.target: 添加一些新文件

trans-unit.source: Single files are fine for simple one-off programs, but chances are you're going to want to break things out into multiple files if you're building anything which has multiple components.
trans-unit.target: 对于简单的一次性程序，单个文件即可，但如果要生成含有多个组件的内容，则可能需要将内容拆分为多个文件。

trans-unit.source: Multiple files are a way to do that.
trans-unit.target: 多个文件是一种方法。

trans-unit.source: Create a new file and give it a unique namespace:
trans-unit.target: 新建一个文件，并为其提供唯一的命名空间：

trans-unit.source: Next, include it in your `Program.cs` file:
trans-unit.target: 接下来，将其包含在 `Program.cs` 文件中：

trans-unit.source: And finally, you can build it:
trans-unit.target: 最后，可生成它：

trans-unit.source: Now the fun part: making the new file do something!
trans-unit.target: 现在才是有趣的部分：让新文件执行一些操作！

trans-unit.source: Example: A Fibonacci Sequence Generator
trans-unit.target: 示例：Fibonacci 序列生成器

trans-unit.source: Let's say you want to build off of the previous Fibonacci example by caching some Fibonacci values and add some recursive flair.
trans-unit.target: 假设希望通过缓存一些斐波那契值，基于之前的斐波那契示例进行生成，并添加一些递归特性。

trans-unit.source: Your code for a [better Fibonacci example](https://github.com/dotnet/docs/tree/master/samples/core/console-apps/FibonacciBetterMsBuild) might use a new `FibonacciGenerator.cs` file with the following code.
trans-unit.target: [更好的斐波那契示例](https://github.com/dotnet/docs/tree/master/samples/core/console-apps/FibonacciBetterMsBuild)的代码可能会使用具有以下代码的新 `FibonacciGenerator.cs` 文件。

trans-unit.source: Now adjust the `Main()` method in your `Program.cs` file as shown below.
trans-unit.target: 现在，只需如下所示调整 `Program.cs` 文件中的 `Main()` 方法。

trans-unit.source: Finally, run it!
trans-unit.target: 最后，运行它！

trans-unit.source: And that's it!
trans-unit.target: 就是这么简单！

trans-unit.source: Conclusion
trans-unit.target: 结束语

trans-unit.source: Hopefully this guide has helped you learn how to create a .NET Core console app, from the basics all the way up to a multi-project system with unit tests.
trans-unit.target: 希望本指南可帮助你了解如何创建 .NET Core 控制台应用（从基本知识一直到含单元测试的多项目系统）。

trans-unit.source: The next step is to create awesome console apps of your own!
trans-unit.target: 下一步就是创建属于自己的出色控制台应用！

trans-unit.source: If a more advanced example of a console app interests you, check out the next tutorial: [Organizing and testing projects with the .NET Core command line (SDK Preview 3)](using-with-xplat-cli-msbuild-folders.md).
trans-unit.target: 如果对控制台应用的更高级示例感兴趣，请查阅下一个教程：[使用 .NET Core 命令行（SDK 预览版 3）组织和测试项目](using-with-xplat-cli-msbuild-folders.md)。
